field.label: Enable clamd service
field.help: This will activate the clamd service.

field.label: Enable freshclam service
field.help: This will activate the freshclam service.

field.label: Enable TCP port
field.help: This will enable TCP port 3310 in addition to the local socket.

field.label: Maximum number of threads running
field.help: Maximum number of threads running at the same time.

field.label: Maximum number of queued items
field.help: Maximum number of queued items (including those being processed by MaxThreads threads). It is recommended to have this value at least twice MaxThreads if possible.

field.label: Idle timeout
field.help: Waiting for a new job will timeout after this time in seconds.

field.label: Max directory recursion
field.help: Maximum depth directories are scanned at.

field.label: Disable cache
field.help: This option allows you to disable the caching feature of the engine.

field.label: Scan portable executable
field.help: PE stands for Portable Executable - it's an executable file format used in all 32 and 64-bit versions of Windows operating systems.

field.label: Scan executable and linking format
field.help: Executable and Linking Format is a standard format for UN*X executables.

field.label: Detect broken executables
field.help: With this option clamav will try to detect broken executables (both PE and ELF) and mark them as Broken.

field.label: Scan OLE2
field.help: This option enables scanning of OLE2 files, such as Microsoft Office documents and .msi files.

field.label: OLE2 block macros
field.help: With this option enabled OLE2 files with VBA macros, which were not detected by signatures will be marked as "Heuristics.OLE2.ContainsMacros".

field.label: Scan PDF files
field.help: This option enables scanning within PDF files.

field.label: Scan SWF
field.help: This option enables scanning within SWF files.

field.label: Scan XMLDOCS
field.help: This option enables scanning xml-based document files supported by libclamav.

field.label: Scan HWP3
field.help: This option enables scanning of HWP3 files.

field.label: Decode mail files
field.help: If you turn off this option, the original files will still be scanned, but without parsing individual messages/attachments.

field.label: Scan HTML
field.help: Perform HTML normalisation and decryption of MS Script Encoder code.

field.label: Scan archives
field.help: ClamAV will scan within archives and compressed files.

field.label: Block encrypted archive
field.help: Mark encrypted archives as viruses (Encrypted.Zip, Encrypted.RAR).

field.label: Max scan size
field.help: This option sets the maximum amount of data to be scanned for each input file. Archives and other containers are recursively extracted and scanned up to this value.

field.label: Max file size
field.help: Files larger than this limit won't be scanned.

field.label: Max recursion
field.help: Nested archives are scanned recursively, e.g. if a Zip archive contains a RAR file, all files within it will also be scanned.

field.label: Max files
field.help: Number of files to be scanned within an archive, a document, or any other container file.

field.label: Freshclam log verbose
field.help: Enable verbose logging.

field.label: Freshclam database mirror
field.help: database.clamav.net is a round-robin record which points to the most reliable mirrors. DO NOT TOUCH the following line unless you know what you are doing.

field.label: Freshclam connect timeout
field.help: Timeout in seconds when connecting to database server.

field.label: Add Malware Expert Signatures
field.help: Activate third party signatures from Malware Expert. Use at your own risk.

field.label: Add BLURL Signatures
field.help: Activate third party signatures from BLURL. Use at your own risk.

field.label: Add JURLBLA Signatures
field.help: Activate third party signatures from Sanesecurtiy JURLBLA. Use at your own risk.

field.label: Add BOFHLand Signatures
field.help: Activate third party signatures from Sanesecurtiy BOFHLand. Use at your own risk.
